text: Maniyarakallan is a 2005 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Rajan P. Dev. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/maniyara-kallan.html ==Cast== *Harisree Ashokan as Ramani/Ramana chandran *Jagadish as Sugunan *Adithyan as Anandan *Vijayaraghavan as Karthikeyan *Rajan P. Dev as Kammath *Ravi Menon as Driver Damu *K. R. Vatsala as Kasthuri's mother *Ponnamma Babu as Komalam *Bala Singh as Nagaraja Mannadiar *Lakshana as Sona *Mamukkoya as Alavikka *Kottayam Nazeer as Chakkala Pathrose *Thara Balachandran as Kasthuri *Mohammed Shah as Henchman ==References== Category:2005 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Maniyarakallan
